title: New: Yung Life – Breaker
body:
It’s a wet, windy Tuesday evening, I have a horrendous cold and I’m trying to compile countless End of Year lists.

Luckily, what should fall into my lap, but none other than a brand new track from Knoxville’s **Yung Life**, in the form of the hugely 80’s inspired _Breaker_. It’s gloriously upbeat, kind of like a-ha brought into the 21st century and embodying the spirit of a angsty, lovelorn, **New Order** listening teenager. Grab a free download of _Breaker_ below, and keep your ears peeled for a new EP in 2012.
